service_dependencies: Local services only; external APIs are mocked.

infrastructure_stack: Docker containers within GitHub Actions runners
service_dependencies: Containerized services for DB, RabbitMQ. External APIs mocked.

data_refresh_frequency: Weekly (from sanitized production snapshot) or on-demand for migration tests.
infrastructure_stack: AWS EKS, RDS, S3, ElastiCache, Amazon MQ (production replica).
service_dependencies: Live integration with GSP and GPS provider sandboxes.
monitoring_tools: Full stack: Prometheus, Grafana, Fluentbit, OpenSearch, Alertmanager.

infrastructure_stack: AWS EKS (HA), RDS (Multi-AZ), S3, ElastiCache, Amazon MQ.
service_dependencies: Live integration with production GSP and GPS APIs.
monitoring_tools: Full stack: Prometheus, Grafana, Fluentbit, OpenSearch, Alertmanager.
access_control: Site Reliability Engineers (SREs), limited Admin access.
backup_strategy: Continuous Point-In-Time-Recovery (PITR) on RDS, versioning on S3.
maintenance_window: Pre-announced, low-traffic hours (e.g., Sunday 2-4 AM IST).
